title: These are Online Journalists?
selftext:
What in even Now Something Orange and Green is Becoming Indian Flag and Every Punjabi if seen wearing this colour combination is now a Khalistani?? It's mind boggling to see such retarded grown aÃŸÃŸ people.

Here's the Original Tweet - https://twitter.com/AsYouNotWish/status/1709867097957011841?t=jBRMLI--H4UTaF2uWQmbTA&s=19
comments: Godi media has been aggressive against the Sikhs for some time now.
Did you forget the whole Bhesharam  Rang fiasco  , all these retards   need is something  that resonates  with the bhakt mandali  nd it's circus from thereon ..

My honest reaction to her:/j

Me to Ms Mahajan

If someone spits toward the sun, it is going to fall back to his face.

Hindustan Zindabad tha, Zindabad hai aur Zindabad rahega...
Lemme just yoink this for future use :)

Stealing this.

Thanks.

Ye sab mere feed me toh nahi aataðŸ˜‚ 

Alag alag kono se khoj ke laate ho kya ye sab?
Tu Gadar 2 phir we dekh ke aaa pehle
When u think RW journalist can't stoop any lower

Not a journalist. I think she is one of those paid members of BJ Party IT Cell. 
She has gained her following amongst the people as someone from Kashmiri Dogra community. 
But unfortunately she uses that to spew venom against anyone and everyone who are against BJP.
Why the hell you're getting downvoted?

What if rindia is full of rpakistan users .
Kanspiratcy theory
Whatâ€™s the bitch trying to do here? To frame Diljit as disrespecting the flag?
Yes.

Apparently Because He Is Wearing a "Pajama" with Green colour.

Why can't a similar argument be phrased like he is wearing a saffron turban with white shirt and green pants so he is looking Irish lmao.

https://preview.redd.it/4b73k9vrpjsb1.jpeg?width=1080&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=30549a9b538ce7e02448b82882262499de30e9f5
Too low even for this godhi larping bitch.
paxtanis getting mad

Isn't diljeet in the video is wearing a saffron turban with white shirt.
Aren't saffron and white colors of the Indian flag?
A good propagandist would spin this as an assault on Hindu (orange) and Muslim (green) culture, but alas the Sanghi bitch can't even be sasti Goebbels
